Key Points: 1. Sit with legs extended in front of you. 2. Inhale and lengthen the spine. 3. Exhale and reach forward towards your toes, keeping the spine straight. 4. Hold the pose for several breaths.
Benefits: 1. Calms the mind. 2. Stretches the spine and hamstrings. 3. Improves digestion. 4. Relieves stress and anxiety.
Instructions: 1. Keep your spine straight throughout the pose. 2. Hold for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
